definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.chinese: 一位年轻的士兵，张着嘴，光着头。

sentences.english: Cuiping finally realized her act and took the pipe and went out bare foot to the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 倒是翠平猛然醒悟过来，拎着烟袋光着脚跑到阳台上。

sentences.english: I put one bare foot on the note.
sentences.chinese: 我用一只光着的脚踩住那张便条。

sentences.english: Toddlers like to run around the house bare naked .
sentences.chinese: 刚会走路的孩子喜欢光着脚在房子周围跑来跑去。

sentences.english: Bareheaded , he sat upon the stone post at the door of his house.
sentences.chinese: 他光着头，坐在家门口的护墙石礅上。

sentences.english: Running about without sandals, the bare soles of my feet were soon burning.
sentences.chinese: 因为光着脚跑，我的脚底很快就像要烧起来一样。

sentences.english: He snatched off his cap and stood bareheaded and panting.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙脱下帽子，光着头气喘吁吁地站在那里。

sentences.english: He slid onto the cement floor and vomited as his bare body hit puddles of human waste.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒在水泥地上，光着的身体碰到了粪坑他呕吐了。

definition: bare upper body/bare-chested/to bare one's chest
to wear (one's shoes) like babouche slippers/(onom.) shuffling sound
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
not wearing one thread (idiom); absolutely naked/without a stitch of clothing/in one's birthday suit
